name: HQ_RESIDENTIAL_HOUSE_GAME_JAM_PSX_STYLED_GAME
description:
THIS GAME REQUIRES A CONTROLLER TO PLAY

GAME DESCRIPTION:

You are Nuke Doomenstine, a space force commander sent to the HQ Residential facility to clear it of alien hostiles.  

GAME JAM VERSION:

Due to time constraints and memory issues, I was unable to perfect the game, so because of that, story is very limited, it's not fully complete with lots of bugs and issues like crashes.  This is more of a tech demo for a scifi themed HQ Residential House.  I liked the concept so much that I created four levels for the game.  If enough people like this game I'll finalize and finish the game, making it more of a unique Scifi shooter.  I hope it's enjoyable.

Each of the levels is in it's own folder due to the memory issues I mentioned above.  I simply didn't have enough time to work around it between my main projects, school and sports.   As I said above if it's wanted enough I will create a full complete version once my official game S.C.A.R.E.D. is done.  Please enjoy this demo!
